ygData.subject: RE: Denon's Dissension
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You are correct, I failed the mention the casters that are 20 levels below me who could kill me over and over again with the mana they had. I forgot all
ygData.messageBody:
> Unfortunately in terms of even cons it effectively is unlimited. Even green
> no xp bandit wizard casters will kill a single PC many levels after he stops
> getting xp for them. If the song cut their mana by 10% per pulse it might
> matter, but otherwise its pretty much a waste.

You are correct, I failed the mention the casters that are 20 levels
below me who could kill me over and over again with the mana they had.

I forgot all about that, sorry Kit ;)

Harmonic.
